q_en: I am from The Hong Kong Polytechnic University. Today is July 2, 2024. Please help me create an order for 50 red T-shirts in size M and 30 blue sweaters in size XL.

steps.sql: INSERT INTO orders (user_id, order_name, created_at) VALUES ((SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'PolyU'), 'Order for PolyU on July 2, 2024', '2024-07-02'); INSERT INTO order_product (order_id, product_id, number) VALUES ((SELECT MAX(id) FROM orders), (SELECT id FROM products WHERE products_type_id = (SELECT id FROM products_types WHERE description = 'Red') AND attributes = 'M size'), 50), ((SELECT MAX(id) FROM orders), (SELECT id FROM products WHERE products_type_id = (SELECT id FROM products_types WHERE description = 'Blue') AND attributes = 'XL size'), 30);
steps.description: To create an order for the specified products, we need to first identify the customer ID for 'PolyU', then insert new records into the orders and order_product tables for the requested products.
